items.title: Activist Ananym Capital sees upside if Baker Hughes spins off its oilfield services business
items.description: Ananym said it expects a potential separation could result in an about 51% immediate upside through realizing Baker's sum of parts valuation.

items.title: These are the most oversold stocks in the market that are ripe for a near-term bounce
items.description: We used the CNBC Pro stock screener to find stocks that have a 14-day relative strength index (RSI) below 30, leaving them technically oversold.

items.title: Does Berkshire's big tech bet signal a new risk tolerance in Omaha?
items.description: Berkshire Hathaway's purchase of Alphabet shares may signal a new acceptance of greater risk for greater reward.

items.title: Robinhood shares drop 12% this week amid losses in bitcoin, AI stocks
items.description: The platform's core business relies on retail investors pouring into speculative corners of the market, particularly crypto and AI-linked stocks.

items.title: Two retail stocks to buy as the holiday shopping season kicks off next week
items.description: Loop Capital says Best Buy and Five Below will stand strong in a cloudy U.S. economy.
